programme.title: Cinque per l'inferno
programme.desc: Cinque per l'inferno features five men caught in a dangerous mission against sinister forces.

programme.title: Stunt Squad
programme.desc: In the city of Bologna, the dangerous bandit Valli, with his group, runs an extortion racket by terrorizing merchants. On the gang's trail comes Police Commissioner Grifi, kicking off a long hunt for the extortionists and murderers.

programme.title: Erotomania
programme.desc: Lawyer Persichetti is an executive of a major oil company. The man suffers from a neurosis that prevents him from having satisfying sexual relations with both his wife Ciccia and his young and uninhibited lover Claretta. In an attempt to recover, he relies on the care of a strange psychiatrist, but without much success.

programme.title: The Alcove
programme.desc: 1936. Commander Elio returns from the Abyssinian front. Back home in Italy, his wife and his secretary, also her lover, are waiting for him. The man has a beautiful black girl with him, which triggers perversions and jealousies.

programme.title: Ben and Charlie
programme.desc: The pair of small-time hustlers settle in a town with the intention of conning the locals out of their money. This time, however, the duo will end up outsmarting themselves.

programme.title: Come niente
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Greta and 11-year-old Caterina, spend the summer with their grandfather Franco, who survived a major earthquake in central Italy.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.

programme.title: Take Five
programme.desc: Five unlikely thieves are faced with the opportunity of a lifetime: a multi-million dollar robbery in a bank vault. At first united to carry out the plan, the gang members, however, allow themselves to be carried away by inexperience and avarice, each of them thinking of their own gain.

programme.title: Live Like a Cop, Die Like a Man
programme.desc: Two policemen, members of a special squad that uses methods outside the rules and is given a licence to kill, have to catch a notorious Roman criminal. To this end they investigate undercover.

programme.title: The Alcove
programme.desc: 1936. Commander Elio returns from the Abyssinian front. Back home in Italy, his wife and his secretary, also her lover, are waiting for him. The man has a beautiful black girl with him, which triggers perversions and jealousies.

programme.title: Ben and Charlie
programme.desc: The pair of small-time hustlers settle in a town with the intention of conning the locals out of their money. This time, however, the duo will end up outsmarting themselves.

programme.title: Come niente
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Greta and 11-year-old Caterina, spend the summer with their grandfather Franco, who survived a major earthquake in central Italy.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.
